This request is a natural consequence of Egypt's long-standing policy of seeking the restitution of all archaeological and historical artifacts that have been taken illicitly out of the country, it said. Every president has a challenge when it goes from campaigning to governing, takes a while to figure out the difference between campaign and governing, Colin Powell said on CNN's ''State of the Union.'' ''Now we see at the end of the second year, he is definitely focusing on governing... we'll see how 2011 goes.''
